description: California Lilac (Ceanothus 'Minmarose' Marie Rose), also known as the Wild Lilac, is a beautiful shrub with bright pink flowers that bloom in late spring and summer. It has glossy green foliage, an upright habit, and fragrant blooms that attract bees and butterflies. This plant is drought tolerant, making it easy to maintain, and also quite hardy to hot and dry climates. It's a great addition to any landscape, with its cheerful flowers and evergreen balance. It can be planted as a hedge or in containers for a tough, ornamental beauty. California Lilac ‘Minmarose’ Marie Rose is a stunning, low maintenance landscaping delight that will bring color and joy to any garden.
